snippet.title: Scholar of the Arcane Arts - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Scholar of the Arcane Arts is a Roguelike Action RPG where you must rely on your knowledge of how magic actually works to survive. Learn new spells, solve puzzles, unlock secret dungeons, and defeat monstrous beings to save the world invaded by five Planes of magic!

Scholar of the Arcane Arts on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1650200/Scholar_of_the_Arcane_Arts/
